Title: Old Indianapolis City Legal Limits [City of Indianapolis and Marion County, Indiana]
Description: Polygon file representing the Old Indianapolis City Legal Limits in Marion County, Indiana.Data projection: NAD 1983 StatePlane Indiana East FIPS 1301 (US Feet)
Creator: City of Indianapolis and Marion County - IndyGIS
